extendedInfo.description: Prove you're a genius with The Moron Test, mobile's leading brain-teaser! Graduate from Moron to Genius as you tap, twist, and think your way through these fun and tricky challenges! Master the test, then share it with your friends and family!The Moron Test is one of the mobile's best selling apps of all time and has over 16 million downloads worldwide, and now you can play the FULL original version for FREE! Play now and see why The Moron Test has become a household name!The Moron Test - it's fun to FAIL!FEATURES:- The FULL original version of The Moron Test... for FREE!- Simple, addicting game play fun for all ages!- Play through dozens of question types- 7 levels ranging from Moron to Genius- Fun characters, sound effects, and music- Checkpoints and continues in each section- Brag on Facebook by sharing your best score- You will LOVE watching your friends fail!Also, check inside for "Failing in Love", the first animated short featuring characters from The Moron Test!REVIEWS:MacWorld: "Names Can Be Deceiving: Despite its name, The Moron Test isnât a dopey gimmick. Rather, itâs very addictive, delightfully drawn, and extremely entertaining."USA Today: "Addictive iPhone App" "This clever game is also fun to pass to friends..."148apps.com: ââ¦highly addictive time wasterâ¦â ââ¦for a half hour of my life nothing else in the world mattered.âCheck us out online for hints, news, and updates!http://www.themorontest.comhttp://www.facebook.com/themorontesthttp://www.twitter.com/themorontest[NOTE: Please remember that your 5 star reviews help keep the updates coming! Also, please no spoilers in the reviews!]

reviews.title: AMAZING!!!!!
reviews.comment: THIS APP IS ABSOLUTELY~AMAZING. I HAVE BEEN ON IT ALL DAY! IT IS PROBABLY THE BEST APP I\'VE EVER GOT! IT\'S A MUST HAVE, DEFINATELY!! PS: Chloe, to get past the egg part, click the egg in the text, where it tells you what to do:) Hope this helpedxD
reviews.author: Sarah Gough

reviews.title: Great Game
reviews.comment: Cute game! Very well done, no glitches or any other problems. I recommend dowloading this game!
reviews.author: Lauren C

reviews.title: e.e
reviews.comment: I want to flip my phone...! But this is a good app. (>U<) It\'s so frustrating and fun. *sigh* I love apps like this... (=w=)
reviews.author: Iris Madrinan

reviews.title: So irritating..
reviews.comment: Good game but way too many ads.
reviews.author: Tomy Tran

reviews.title: Too many ads interrupt game
reviews.comment: Ads run far too often, t hey interrupt gameplay,  and the time counts against  you! Major fail.
reviews.author: William Donnelly

reviews.title: Bad app
reviews.comment: I finished the test but then an ad popped up so i cloesed it but it didnt close so i exited the game and reopened it when i saw if it got to record it it didnt and i tried to play the game the ad was still there
reviews.author: desiree prado

reviews.title: Please fix
reviews.comment: Every time I get to the red arrow, I turn my phone the other way causing the arrow to change to green but every time I touch it the time at the bottom left of the screen stops and then it goes back to the beginning of the game
reviews.author: Nichole Taylor

reviews.title: It\'s a game of come sense.
reviews.comment: It\'s fun but challenging. Sometimes it\'s also confusing.

reviews.comment: Wat shld v do when they say touch d upward arrow..their z nly downward arrow n their z no change in it

reviews.comment: Sound fun from other comments but i wont ever get to frikin know cuz it wont even frikin open man i was looking forward to seein if i was a moron
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Come on
reviews.comment: Used to be a great game. Now some stupid ads always interrupt me, and it stops me from beating my high score. I don\'t mind the ads... as long as they\'re not in the middle of a game!!! Another breast game, ruined by stupid ads.
reviews.author: Joey Tripp

reviews.title: Glitchy
reviews.comment: I like the app. However, the only way to close out of the pop up ads is to hit back (x button doesn\'t do anything), which forces you to restart the game. Very frustrating!
reviews.author: Rashaad Balbale

reviews.title: GREAT!!!!
reviews.comment: I love the game and completed it too! For you guys having troubles on the last bit when there is a down arrow and you sit there and it dosent change the twist your divice and it should turn green and facing upwards !  Hope it solved your problem . LOVE MORON TEST

reviews.title: Good but..
reviews.comment: I love this game but when I exit and try to play it again it won\'t let me and the screen goes black.
reviews.author: Melanie Ortega

reviews.title: Good fun, but faulty
reviews.comment: This provided lots of fun for my kids, friends, co workers and myself! The Up Arrow section took us a good minute...thanks for the tip to.turn the phone upside down!
reviews.author: Heather Erickson

reviews.title: Awesome and fun game
reviews.comment: This is an awesome and fun game. This section ( the first section ) is easy, but the second and third is hard. :( But at least this one is easy. :)
reviews.author: Tamara Darby

reviews.title: Even better with the ads.
reviews.comment: As if it weren\'t challenging enough to begin with, throw in an ad that comes up several times on the way through and program the ad not tip respond to the \"x\" in its to right corner - genius. Now it is even harder to get through! If you can\'t tell by my rating, I\'m not being sarcastic...  MWUHAHAHAHA! Can you get less than 140 seconds too?
reviews.author: Jason Bigelow

reviews.title: The ads are annoying!!
reviews.comment: The ads are very annoying there is no need to have a giant ad that won\'t close. Not only do i have to start over. I can\'t get the game back wtf is the add for anyways?? please fix this, this asap cause that\'s why you got 3 stars the game over all is great.
reviews.author: Ray Libby

reviews.title: Sucks.
reviews.comment: Love the game but the Ads always stop me. Fix it now.
